@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“rsfaker, post:7, topic:84662”]its fine up until the boss and for some reason it goes realy slow and dont make it till about half way…
perhaps u can make it faster?[/quote]
The BOSS was perfect for me, didn’t stuff up or anything. It is probably your computer, if it is lagging then just change the Wait times as it says in the “Other Info:” part.

Any ideas for the script or bugs, please post.

item.title: Typing Terror | The best one around | Anti-ban
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[center][size=15pt]Typing Terror Script v2.1
By Dudeofthed[/size][/center]

This is a typing terror script i have made. It has to pretty much be the best one around and can defeat the boss. Includes anti-ban and more.

Updated.
Here is the list of updates:

Version 0.5
Added Anti-Ban.
All Keys Working

Version 1.0
Added More Anti-Ban.

Version 2.0
Add Bitmaps (You can go away for like 5 mins and then come back and the game is finished).

  • What this update did was add a bitmap of Space. Because at the end of each level ot says
    press space to continue. So now it automatically press’s space for you (Well Clicks the Mouse).

Version 2.1
The bitmaps weren’t working so i removed them and added a space key instead.

Beginning Of Script://///////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // // Dudeofthed Presents: // // Typing Terror Script // // // // For a game named: // // Neopets.com // // Version of script: // // 2.1 // // // //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // // Information: // // This script is for Typing Terror, a game found // // in Neopets.com. It is under the "Word Games" genre. // // This script will automatically type for you, it is // // able to defeat the boss and finish the game. A very // // few scripts cannot defeat the boss for some reason. // // // // Enjoy this script by Dudeofthed! // // // ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Here is the actual script (Just Copy and Paste into SCAR Window):[code]///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// //
// Dudeofthed Presents: //
// Typing Terror Script //
// //
// For a game named: //
// Neopets.com //
// Version of script: //
// 2.1 //
// //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// //
// Information: //
// This script is for Typing Terror, a game found //
// in Neopets.com. It is under the “Word Games” genre. //
// This script will automatically type for you, it is //
// able to defeat the boss and finish the game. A very //
// few scripts cannot defeat the boss for some reason. //
// //
// Enjoy this script by Dudeofthed! //
// //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

{
Instructions:
1. Open up Typing Terror game in any sized window.
2. Drag the crosshair over the game until a black box
appears over the game.
3. Press “PLAY GAME” in Typing Terror.
4. Select “NORMAL” difficulty, then use the HotKey
to start the script.
5. Press F7 to cancel the script.

Other Info:
If game is lagging or running too slow when the script
is running, may i suggest to change the Wait Times from
Wait(10) to Wait(50). If it is still lagging then change
the wait times again to Wait(100). If lagging still continues
please send some feedback and you will be given immediate
attention and technical support and hopefully i will be able
to solve your issue. Please do not post fake feedback just to
receive attention.

Bug Fixes:
Version 0.5
Added Anti-Ban.
All Keys Now Working

          Version 1.0
          Added More Anti-Ban.

          Version 2.0
          Add Bitmaps (You can go away for like 5 mins and then
          come back and the game is finished).

          - What this update did was add a bitmap of Space.
            Because at the end of each level ot says press space
            to continue. So now it automatically press's space
            for you (Well Clicks the Mouse).

          Version 2.1
          The bitmaps weren't working so i removed them and
          added a space key instead.

}

program TypingTerror;

procedure Signature;
begin
Writeln(‘Dudeofthed Presents:’);
Writeln(’ A Typing Terror Script’);
Writeln(’’);
Writeln(‘For a game named:’);
Writeln(’ Neopets’);
Writeln(’’);
Writeln(‘To run, please read instructions on lines 21-28’);
Writeln(’’);
Writeln(‘I hope you have enjoyed this scrip by Dudeofthed’);
end;

procedure KeyDownnUp;
begin
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘a’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘b’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘c’));
Wait(10)
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘d’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘e’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘f’));
Wait(10)
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘g’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘h’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘i’));
Wait(10)
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘j’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘k’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘l’));
Wait(10)
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘m’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘n’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘o’));
Wait(10)
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘p’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘q’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘r’));
Wait(10)
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘s’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘t’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘u’));
Wait(10)
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘v’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘w’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘x’));
Wait(10)
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘y’));
KeyDown(GetKeyCode(‘z’));
Wait(10)
KeyDown(32);
end;

begin
Signature;
repeat
KeyDownnUp;
Until(IsFKeyDown(7))
end.[/code]

Please send as much feedback as possible if any bugs are found. You may comment on this script as long as it is not negative. If any negative replies come, i will cry. Any improvements please post.
Thank you.

I hope you enjoy this script by Dudeofthed!

Read full topic
